page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content: The town of Llandrindod has two Primary schools, a Secondary school, and a College of Further Education. The two Primary schools are Llandrindod County Primary School and Ysgol Trefonnen. They both have approximately 250 children aged from 4 to 11. Llandrindod High School is a mixed comprehensive with about 650 children aged from 11 to 18. In addition to the two local junior schools it is fed by a number of other junior schools from surrounding towns and villages. The College of Further Education offers a wide range of vocational courses ranging from Business Studies to Child Care. It also offers the usual academic subjects. It also offers a wide range of non_vocational and extra_mural courses ranging from Keep_Fit to politics.
